settings.name: Percentage of points to overlap
settings.description: Define the percentage of locations that your Minimum Convex Polygon shall overlap (by individual, unit=%)

settings.name: Zoom factor of underlying map.
settings.description: Select a value between 3(continent) and 18(building) defining the initial background (openstreetmap) map resolution. Note that, depending on your data, high resolutions might not be possible (leading to grey background). You can adapt the resolution interactively in the App UI. Default 10(city)

settings.name: Edge size
settings.description: Define edge size to view coastlines (in degrees of lon/lat)
